name: OldMacDonald
0:
”Alexa, ask Old MacDonald for a duck”
”Alexa, ask Old MacDonald for a banjo”
”Alexa, ask Old MacDonald to recite the whole rhyme”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: old macdonald
des:
Welcome to Old MacDonald's farm. I'm sure you've heard of him and all his noisy animals. Give this skill the name of an animal and Alexa will tell you what sound it makes by reciting a verse of this classic nursery rhyme.

If you give it the name of an animal it hasn't heard of before, it asks you to tell it what sound that animal makes and then continues on with the rhyme.

Surprising and entertaining, you never really know what to expect.

Here is just a small sampling of the ever-growing list of "farm animals" this skill recognizes:

- chick
- cow
- pig
- duck
- horse
- lamb
- rooster
- kitten
- frog
- elephant
- banjo
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
